vlive.korean: 막 바로 살아날 걸요? It will gain strength again?! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 안 주무시면 컴온 ~ 🐮💩 방송
심장 터지면 살아날 수 있어? Can you live if the heart bursts? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연습하고 왔어요💦
vlive.english: Can you live if the heart bursts?

vlive.korean: 그 할매한테 붙잡히면 살아날 방법이 없는 거야? Is there any way to save someone caught by the granny ghost? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 웹드라마 [기적 소녀 4화] 절대 뒤돌아 보지마!
vlive.english: Is there any way to save someone caught by the granny ghost?

vlive.korean: 다시 살아날 수도? Even if it's to come back to life? 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : 텔레씨네 <아이리시어퍼컷> 4화
vlive.english: Even if it's to come back to life?

vlive.korean: 먹고 한숨 자면... -또 살아날 거예요. We will sleep after we eat... - We will be okay after the nap. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 찐달의 점심 먹방♡
vlive.english: We will sleep after we eat... - We will be okay after the nap.

examples.korean: The local economy is poised for take-off. 발음듣기 지역 경제가 살아날 채비를 갖추고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The local economy is poised for take-off. 발음

examples.korean: We despaired of his life.=His life is despaired of. 발음듣기 그는 살아날 가망이 없다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We despaired of his life.=His life is despaired of. 발음

examples.korean: His life is despaired of. 발음듣기 그는 살아날 가망이 없습니다. Neungyule
examples.english: His life is despaired of. 발음

examples.korean: The doctor insinuated (to us) that the patient would probably die. 발음듣기 의사는 (우리에게) 환자가 아마 살아날 수 없을 것이라고 넌지시 말했다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The doctor insinuated (to us) that the patient would probably die. 발음

examples.korean: Possibility of his survival is very slim. 발음듣기 다시 살아날 가망성이 적어요. Neungyule
examples.english: Possibility of his survival is very slim. 발음
